column4: you seemed to be able to help univremonster with his drivers issue, maybe you could help me too with a graphics issue?
installed new driver, and after that my gui hasn't worked.
nvidia geforce go 7600, not sure on the driver .... x.org is the only thing i remember.
how did you install the driver?
package manager, the one that gnome uses.
yes, which driver did you install...?
what error do you get on startup?
when the ubuntu loading screen displeys it goes blank afterwards...
blank.? you get text? and error? a prompt...?
I am able to log on in text mode
did you mess with your xorg when you installed the driveR?
i executed an instruction for enabling that driver (command came up after instaling the package), I got a error message there i think but I thought it didnt mean so much...
ok do "sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg" and choose the "nv" driver and the defaults for everything else
then run startx to get into the gui
